cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 2.
Whenever you cast a spell that has miracle, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. That creature gains flying until end of turn.

When Dan Xiao enters the battlefield, conscript. [i](Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token or tap two untapped creatures you control to put a +1/+1 counter on them.)[/i]
Whenever Dan Xiao attacks, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Soldier card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Create two 1/1 red and white Soldier creature tokens. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, create an additional 1/1 white Soldier creature token. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
When Bai Qiu enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Whenever you cast a Spirit spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value was 5 or greater, draw a card.

If {W} was spent to cast this spell, you gain 2 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, tap or untap up to one target permanent.
Draw a card.
